participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and imaginative, she finds joy in the little moments of life.
participant_1.background: I wake up and watch my daughter sleep for a few minutes before getting out of bed. My weight is irrelevant. I love sweets. I'm relatively new to the workforce, but I've been at my current job for a few months now. I believe in fairytales.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, they have a strong passion for cooking and learning.
participant_2.background: I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook. I have a severe phobia of wide open spaces. I hate that my mom made me get braces. I love growing plants in my greenhouse, but I have to be careful about what I grow because of my asthma. I now have a new most valuable possession - my library card.

content.text: I'm a relatively new mother, and I love to wake up and watch my daughter sleep for a few minutes before getting out of bed.
That must be very sweet! I'm not a parent myself, but I love kids.
It really is! What do you do for a living?
I'm a chef, and I love to cook!
I love sweets! What's your favorite thing to cook?
Oh, that's a tough question! I love making desserts, but I also love making salads.
I love salads too! What kind of food do you like to grow in your greenhouse?
I used to grow a lot of different things, but now I have to be careful because of my asthma. I mostly grow tomatoes and herbs now.
That's still really cool! I love tomatoes.
Me too! They're my favorite fruit.
So did I, but apparently they're classified as a fruit!
It is! I love learning new things.
Me too! I like to read a lot, so I'm always learning new things.
